429.message: [429] You have surpassed one of the established rate limits in the API. Please refer to the Fireberry API documentation on rate limits for further information.

docs:
#How to get your token#
To get your tokenid please login to your powerlink account and click on the gear icon on the top left corner then select ממשקי אינטרנט and copy your token
